content: 2dc in bottom of ch2 1dc in next st * 2dc in next st 1 double_crochet in next st* repeat from *to* to end join round 4- ch2 2dc in bottom of ch2 1dc in next 2 sts * 2dc in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat from *to* join round 5- ch2 2dc in bottom of ch2 1dc in next 3sts * 2dc in next st 1dc in next 3sts* repeat from *to* join round 6-9 ch3 skip1 1dc in next stitch 1 double_crochet in skipped stitch* repeat from * to* to end join in top of ch3 turn fasten_off weave in ends finished items may be sold pattern is not for resale all contents © 2014 sinead deegan designs all rights reserved
